remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute.IsValid%2A> method to determine whether the object that is specified by the parameter is valid. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute.Validate%2A> method returns `false`, this method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute.FormatErrorMessage%2A> method to get a localized message that states the problem.
